news.title: Walmart reports strong holiday growth, but earnings outlook falls short of estimates
news.summary: This is the first earnings report since new Walmart CEO John Furner took over in early February. It marks the first time Walmart has released its quarterly results since the beginning of February.

news.title: King Charles' brother Andrew arrested on suspicion of misconduct
news.summary: UK police arrest King Charles' brother Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor on suspicion of misconduct in public office. He was arrested on Thursday.

news.title: United Airlines is paring back rewards for travelers who don't have its credit card in MileagePlus overhaul
news.summary: United Airlines is overhauling its MileagePlus loyalty program. It will reward customers who have the carrier's credit card over those without it.

news.title: Small furniture retailers face existential tariff threat, regardless of Supreme Court ruling
news.summary: Small furniture businesses will see little relief as upholstery duties remain. Retailers await a decision from the Supreme Court on the future of tariffs.

news.title: Why New Balance's 'dad shoes' are beating Nike as sales surge 19%
news.summary: New Balance grew sales 19% to $9.2 billion in 2025. The emphasis on street-wear styles and performance resonate with a wide range of shoppers.

news.title: Walmart’s stock falls as the outlook for future profits wasn’t good enough
news.summary: Walmart’s stock drops after quarterly revenue from its U.S. stores and the outlook for profits this year were below Wall Street's projections.

news.title: Deere’s stock jumps toward another record. The construction business is booming again.
news.summary: Deere’s stock surges further into record territory after a big earnings beat and a full-year outlook for sales outperformance. Deere: ‘We’re in a good position to continue to grow our business.’

news.title: While Wall Street is betting against software, retail investors have poured in — and done well
news.summary: Retail investors have been a mighty force to start 2026 and they’ve not shying away from battered software stocks. Retail investors are expected to be a force to be reckoned with in 2026.

news.title: This stock-market strategy combines value, quality and momentum for stellar performance
news.summary: This fund has an unusual approach for setting its portfolio of stocks once a year and letting it ride. The fund has been set up to invest in a range of stocks, with a focus on the technology sector.

news.title: Hims & Hers is spending more than $1 billion in a push to expand globally
news.summary: Hims & Hers' stock surges as a $1.2 billion deal to buy an Australia-based telehealth company affirms the health-and-wellness company's global ambitions.
